entry.title: $2400 // FURNISHED OUTDOOR SPACE__2 EXTRA ROOMS!__LAUNDRY__GIANT SPACE!__NO FEE
entry.content:
*OLD SCHOOL AND LARGE* - Simply put! large and huge one bedroom apartment, no, NOT Fancy, but if you need space and a great location, continue on reading..

Large one bedroom, HUGE full dining / living room with windows and updated kitchen appliances!
Building is updated with on site Laundry room and FURNISHED BACKYARD accessible for all tenants.
Great location in Famous DOWNTOWN BROOKLYN! There are 8 train lines near by turning your commute into a breeze. the A C F R and 2 3 4 5 trains are all nearby.

Large layout with full separate living room and separate kitchen, TWO extra railroad rooms that can be converted for 2nd bedrooms or / and home office space! The main bedroom is a large king size room with great size closet.
Tall ceiling, Stainless steel new kitchen appliances, Plenty windows throughout the apartment that gets great sunlight!
The Apartment has Lots Of Character and Original Detail left for the tenant to enjoy!

Building Amenities: WASHER DRYER in building, Furnished backyard / garden for the entire building to share.
Guarantors accepted Pets Allowed - upon approval.

PRIME LOCATION!!!Near the Brooklyn and Manhattan Bridge and the Brooklyn Queens Expressway . There is 8 train lines near by turning your commute into a breeze. F at York St, A C F R at Jay St - Metro Tech, R 2 3 4 5 at Borough Hall, A C at High St, 2 3 at Hoyt St

Guarantors accepted
Pets Allowed *upon approval,
Laundry Room in the building,
Showing By Appointment, NO BROKERS FEE
Backyard / Outdoor space / Garden


SHOWING BY APPOINTMENT
CALL OR TEXT MOISHE show contact info
